articles.description: Westworld Season 4 has come to a close and we have some big questions after that finale!
articles.content:
This post contains spoilers for Westworld. Be sure to check out our Westworld Finale Review, too! 
The finale of Westworld Season 4 did us a lot of kindnessit worked hard to tie up the seasons loose… [+9089 chars]
